channel.title: Comments on: Make Love, Not Warcraft

item.title: By: Hello Kitty Island Adventures Totally Poans WoW - Amber Night
item.dc:creator: Hello Kitty Island Adventures Totally Poans WoW - Amber Night

item.title: By: heather
item.dc:creator: heather
item.description: I just LOVED the raid leader monotone toward the end. It was dead-on perfect. (I'm not a raider myself--not good for my hands--but I've listened to the Vent conversation on a couple of occasions when my husband's gone raiding.)
item.content:encoded: I just LOVED the raid leader monotone toward the end. It was dead-on perfect. (I’m not a raider myself–not good for my hands–but I’ve listened to the Vent conversation on a couple of occasions when my husband’s gone raiding.)

item.title: By: Big Hal
item.dc:creator: Big Hal
item.description: The episode is probably the closest I will ever get to being on a raid. My wife who never has played any form of MMO thought it was funny. She about peed her self she was laughing so hard when Timmy's character spoke.
item.content:encoded: The episode is probably the closest I will ever get to being on a raid. My wife who never has played any form of MMO thought it was funny. She about peed her self she was laughing so hard when Timmy’s character spoke.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
I talked to a non-WOW, non-gaming person today about the episode and his opinion ... he could follow the gaming stuff, (altho the language was still a mishmash of gibberish), and thought it was hilarious.
I think tho, between you and me, that he thought there was more hyperbole there than reality. We know the truth, however. :)
item.content:encoded:
I talked to a non-WOW, non-gaming person today about the episode and his opinion … he could follow the gaming stuff, (altho the language was still a mishmash of gibberish), and thought it was hilarious.

I think tho, between you and me, that he thought there was more hyperbole there than reality. We know the truth, however. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Saylah
item.dc:creator: Saylah
item.description: Do you think you had to be a WOW player to get just how funny it was? It was so surreal seeing how others might perceive our game-play. It excited me about WOW but before I indulged in the urge to log-on, I realized that we all might need some help and elected to read the forums instead. LOL
item.content:encoded: Do you think you had to be a WOW player to get just how funny it was? It was so surreal seeing how others might perceive our game-play. It excited me about WOW but before I indulged in the urge to log-on, I realized that we all might need some help and elected to read the forums instead. LOL
